explains: adj. 被逗乐的，觉得好笑的
v. 逗乐，逗笑；（提供）消遣（amuse 的过去式和过去分词形式）
wordGroup: amuse oneself 自娱自乐，消遣

sentences.en: We were all amused at his stories.
sentences.cn: 我们都被他的故事逗笑了。

sentences.en: His facial contortions amused the audience of schoolchildren.
sentences.cn: 他扮鬼脸逗得小学生观众都笑起来了。

sentences.en: My funny drawings amused the kids.
sentences.cn: 我的滑稽图画把孩子们逗乐了。
